data.address-invalid-place: Please check all addresses for completeness and that they are selected from the suggested options.
data.address-quick-invalid-origin: Only addresses with postal code 10**, 11**, 12** or 2544 are usable for the pickup address on spontaneous drives.
data.airport-invalid-place: The airport service is only available from/to Vienna. Please adapt your address input.

Your email address is invalid. Check spelling mistakes and structure:
local-part + @ + host-name + '.' + top-level-domain.
Example: local@host.com
data.backend-invalid-entry: The input for the record "{{ENV}}" is incorrect. Please check your input.
data.backend-invalid-id: The login identifier is invalid. Please try again later or contact support.
data.backend-invalid-latency: Latency must not be bigger than 6h. Please check your input.
data.backend-invalid-pass: The login password is invalid. Please try again later or contact support.
data.backend-invalid-pickupTIME: The selected pickup time is invalid. Please check your input.
data.backend-invalid-relevance-stay: A stay at the golf course is not possible because the chosen time for the return trip is too short. Please adjust your input.
data.backend-invalid-relevance-travel: The chosen time range between pickup and target destination is too narrow. Please adjust your input.
data.backend-invalid-stay: Stay must not exceed 72h. Please check your input.
data.backend-invalid-subject: The request was denied because suspicious data were detected. Please try again later or contact support.
data.backend-invalid-tenancy: Tenancy can be max 24h. Please check your input.
data.backend-invalid-user: The login user is invalid. Please try again later or contact support.
data.backend-jwt-missing: Access can not be authenticated without a session token. Please try again later or contact support.
data.backend-max-email: Email service exceeded request limit and is temporary blocked. Please try again in 24h.
data.backend-missing-zipCode: Your selected address was refused. Please check your address to contain a postal code and that it is selected from the suggested options.
data.backend-required: Not all necessary data were transferred. Please check your input.
data.maintenance-code-1: The digital service is currently UNAVAILABLE due to maintenance. For inquiries regarding the transport service, please contact us directly at:
data.navigate-destination-airport/service: For a route between Vienna and Vienna International Airport, the service "AIRPORT" must be used.

business.primary: The focus is on classic tariff rides in cooperation with the 40100 dispatch service in Vienna. Transport of pets, foldable wheelchairs, strollers, golf bags, and other bulky cargo possible as well.
business.secondary:
In addition, I take on package trips in/from/to Lower Austria against advance order, especially inexpensive between Leobersdorf and Vienna, but also between BN/WB/WN and W/WU/SW. Alternatively, round trips can also be taken on the basis of timed rentals. Furthermore, I also offer golf day trips to all golf clubs in Vienna and Lower Austria (GC in other provinces or abroad on request). On request, including accompaniment on the round of golf at a fair flat rate.
Optionally for preorders, beginners or registered callers can arrange spontaneous trips on package prices if available.

private.first: In the first 21 years after graduating from school, I worked as an engineer both domestically and abroad.
private.second: I then changed careers, worked for 3 years as a limited partner (ger: "Kommanditist") at Maxi-Autovermietung and as a chauffeur at Taxi Göring. After successfully passing the entrepreneur's exam, I founded my own taxi company in 1999 as an EPU (single-person enterprise) and run the taxi business continuously in 1-shift operation.

info.text: 'Airport' service orders are only accepted between 04:00 a.m. and 12:00 p.m.

airport.title: Airport - route details

info.text:
- 'Destination' service NÖ allows 1 address within Vienna or any other province.
 - if the option for returning to pickup address is selected, latency must not be bigger than 6h.
- max 3h latency with costs.
info.title: Please note that

labels.back2home: I want to return to my pickup address.
labels.latency: My required time between arrival and return.

info.text:
- Tenancy will be charged for min 3h and max 24h.
- 25 km per hour of rental time are included and cost 35,00 EUR. Additional costs for driving to/from your pickup/dropof address will be charged seperately.
info.title: Please note that

placeholder.note: Add your personal note if required.
placeholder.title: e.g.: Ing.

order.latency-calc: Waiting times: 24,00 EUR for the first hour and 12,00 EUR for each additional hour. Every 1/2 hour started is charged.
order.licence: The transport price meets the requirements of the valid, licensed Viennese taxi fare.
order.stay-calc: Stay: 48,00 EUR for the first 6 hours and 12,00 EUR for each additional hour. Every hour started is charged.
order.surcharge-fuel: I accept that additional costs per kilometer for boost charging (DC) will become due for a distance more than 250 km (EUR 0,07/km after 250th km).
order.surcharge-parking: I accept that additional costs for road charges and/or parking will become due if necessary.
order.tenancy-calc: 25 km per hour of rental time are included. Each additional kilometer costs additionally 0,50 EUR.
order.terms: I agree that I have already reached the age of 18 and provide my personal data only for the purpose of contracting the service. Furthermore, I accept that canceling my order is free only up to 24 hours before the desired time of departure (with taxi). I have to pay 50% of total cost in case of cancelation or unexcused absence within these last 24 hours. If payment is refused, a report will be filed.
order.terms-flatrate: I accept that canceling my order is free only up to 24 hours before the desired time of departure (with taxi). I have to pay 50% of the currently calculated costs ({{fieldValue}},00 EUR) in case of cancelation or unexcused absence within these last 24 hours.
order.warnings: Actual duration and/or distance can vary due to unexpected traffic, construction sites or road accidents.

golf.block-validation: Please select your option of additional service.

info.text:
- check free tee time places and booking conditions at the desired golf club in advance
- choose your pick-up and drop-off time adapted to the planned tee time and estimated time of stay at the golf club (first 3h are included in the price, following 3h are for free)

support-mode.player: I would like to book you as a playing partner (the greenfee for the accompanying playing partner will be covered by taxi-varga).

golf.title: Golf trip - route details

info.text:
A pre-order for this service is NOT possible and can therefore only be applied in case of spontaneous boarding or on call with a short journey
- Calculations via this service are only available for origin address Vienna or Leobersdorf - other routes are to be used in service 'destination'
- max 3h latency with costs.
- Calculations are valid for the official business hours (04:00 a.m. - 12:00 p.m.)

geolocation.text: The location is determined by means of a GPS module or Internet access. Disable any software that changes the location (e.g.: Tor browser, VPN, etc.). If your internet browser does NOT support location detection, we recommend using 'Google Chrome'.
